## Monthly Goals

### Primary Goals

| Goal                | Target | Metric           | Status |
| ------------------- | ------ | ---------------- | ------ |
| New posts published |        | Blog count       | ⬜     |
| Pages optimized     |        | Optimization log | ⬜     |
| Traffic increase    | +\_\_% | GSC comparison   | ⬜     |
| Featured snippets   |        | SERP check       | ⬜     |

### Secondary Goals

| Goal                      | Target | Status |
| ------------------------- | ------ | ------ |
| FAQ sections added        |        | ⬜     |
| Internal links improved   |        | ⬜     |
| Comparison tables added   |        | ⬜     |
| Drafts moved to published |        | ⬜     |

### Optimization Actions by Page

For each page, track:

- [ ] Title rewritten (problem-focused)
- [ ] QuickAnswer box added
- [ ] FAQ section added/expanded
- [ ] Comparison table added
- [ ] Internal links improved
- [ ] Lastmod updated
